# Scarsdale vs Larchmont

Both towns are top choices for relocating buyers, but they fit different lifestyles and budgets.

## Scarsdale

- Higher average home price
- Strong school reputation
- Larger lot sizes in many neighborhoods

## Larchmont

- Strong village and waterfront feel
- Excellent commuter rail access
- More walkable town center options

## Which is right for you?

If schools and larger homes are priority one, Scarsdale may fit better. If walkability and coastal lifestyle matter most, Larchmont often wins.
title: Scarsdale vs Larchmont: Neighborhood Guide for 2026 Buyers
author: marcus-johnson
